nodes.text: The Llanic Spice Run was a trade route which intersected with the Triellus Trade Route at the planet Llanic. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the route was often patrolled by the forces of Moff Abran Balfour, a fact Princess Leia Organa warned the Jedi Luke Skywalker of when he planned to visit Llanic.
After undertaking a heist, the Spice Runners of Kijimi escaped from the Osako pirates through the Torch Nebula along the Llanic Spice Run.
